response.original_title: Sites of Memory and Recovery: A Black San Francisco Story in Dance
response.overview: A dance film short that explores the history and lived experience (past, present, and future) of the still present, but diminishing community of Black San Franciscans. It features improvisational dance performance and narrative of filmmaker Dunn-Salahuddin, Eyla Josie Moore (Dancer), and Jarrel Philips (Educator/Dancer).
response.tagline: Memory and place combine with movement and storytelling to unlock the nuances of the Black experience in San Francisco
response.title: Sites of Memory and Recovery: A Black San Francisco Story in Dance
